backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, question management (CRUD with subject/class filtering), full syllabus test management (create, assign questions, activate/deactivate), and access control with admin/user permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state from OldActor to NewActor by adding fullSyllabusTests map and nextTestId counter while preserving existing userProfiles and questions data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: useFullSyllabusTestQueries hook, useFullSyllabusTestMutations hook, AdminFullSyllabusTestCreate page, and admin route configuration with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components (Layout, Navbar, Footer), pages (Landing, Dashboards, Test interfaces), hooks (queries and mutations), and configuration files with their specific responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color variables for Concept Delta's navy blue theme and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags for Concept Delta MHT-CET platform and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring React Query client and TanStack Router with the route tree and query client context.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Concept Delta branding with delta symbol, quick links, YouTube channel link, social handle, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper component providing consistent structure with Navbar, main content outlet, and Footer across all application pages.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with responsive mobile menu, displaying logo, dashboard/admin links when authenticated, and login/logout buttons using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullSyllabusTestMu: React Query mutations for creating full syllabus tests and assigning questions to tests, with automatic cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching full syllabus tests, individual tests by ID, all questions, and the current user profile from the backend actor.
React Query mutation hook for creating questions with text/image content, multiple choice options, correct answer, explanation, subject, and class level.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, plus responsive hero image styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for analytics, test management, question gallery, and user management, showing placeholder metrics cards and requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminFullSyllabusTest: Admin page for creating full syllabus tests with two sections (Physics/Chemistry and Maths), allowing selection of questions from the question bank and assignment to the test.
frontend/src/pages/AdminQuestionCreate.t: Admin page for creating individual questions with text/image content, four options (each with text/image), correct answer selection, explanation, subject, and class level fields.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showcasing Concept Delta's MHT-CET mock test platform with hero banner, YouTube subscription CTA, Telegram community link, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx: Placeholder leaderboard page displaying test rankings; currently shows a stub message indicating backend integration is pending.
frontend/src/pages/ResultPage.tsx: Placeholder results page for displaying test results by result ID; currently shows a stub message indicating backend integration is pending.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Student dashboard displaying available active full syllabus tests with section details (question count, duration, marks) and start test buttons.
frontend/src/pages/TestInterface.tsx: Placeholder test-taking interface page; currently shows a stub message indicating backend integration is pending.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including landing, dashboards, admin pages, test interface, results, and leaderboard with a shared Layout component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space (including sidebar, chart, and semantic colors), container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for 'Concept Delta' MHT-CET mock test platform, detailing architecture (Motoko backend, React frontend, Internet Identity auth), test types (Full Syllabus and Chapter-Wise), scoring rules, design system (navy blue theme, Inter font), and known issues around image storage and mobile responsiveness.
